channel.title: Mod read this
channel.description:
It is really annoying when you find a "Decent" server in the downloads section to find the "Owner" has deleted the download links. Maybe have a new rule to delete servers without links?
Everyone has there own opinion but think about it.

item.title: Mod read this
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

If links are removed, just report it and it will at least be locked.

Read full topic

item.title: Mod read this
item.dc:creator: @drachtpkz123 drachtpkz123
item.description:
@drachtpkz123 wrote:

Ermm, i think it would be better But it is still a wrong section.

item.title: Mod read this
item.dc:creator: @Skyru Skyru
item.description:
@Skyru wrote:

^ Lol.
@JavaTC, I agree, if you don’t want it released to the public, why release it to the public?
Sounds like a stupid question but think about it.
Although, it is their choice if they want to take their download links down or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Mod read this
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“Skyru, post:10, topic:436216”][quote author=C++ Imbued link=topic=538938.msg3944047#msg3944047 date=1331680293]
Funny how the leechers complain when downloads get taken down. they get taken down for a reason and the owner of the release has rights to remove it if they like.
[/quote]
Lol, i’m pretty sure this thread was made because you took down your download links.[/quote]
His servers are shit anyways though so it doesn’t really matter either way.
What this topic is trying to accomplish, I don’t even know…

Read full topic

item.title: Mod read this
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I think there be a rule about saying “omfg dude no leeching my epic serber i sue u!”, We all know you won’t claim money, no point in trying to intimidate. There will always be leechers, no matter what, just stop trying.

OT: I’ve always believed that you shouldn’t release something that you don’t want open to the public. I know some post it until X amount of downloads, but it’s seriously pointless. Your server won’t be “in-date” forever, it will always be surpassed.

Read full topic

item.title: Mod read this
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

To me, “good server” and “noob owner” are kinda contradictory. But in response to your question, I think that server owners should have rights to remove links if they wish. Entire threads shouldn’t be deleted just for that reason.

Read full topic
